title: Bone Arrow
summaries: The Bone Arrow is an arrow type purchased from the Skeleton Merchant for 15 each, during moon phases 1 (full), 2, 5 (new), and 6. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, Bone Arrows can pierce one enemy. On the [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, they have a 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance of being recoverable after use.
